Name: Heavenly Puzzle
About the game: A puzzle game where you have to collect whole pictures from different pieces. Choose a more convenient mode for yourself and play. Not everyone manages to complete all the levels, but there are a lot of them! Heavenly Puzzle - a puzzle game for manual dexterity and ingenuity. Assemble the whole picture from puzzle pieces. You can choose the difficulty, where time and number of lives are limited. You simply have to collect them all! Game Features: - Choice of difficulty level -Pixel Art - Simple controls - Puzzles
